column5: Has anyone got there hands and tried out the new Berkley Fireline Crystal yet? Was wondering how its visibilty and handling features are compared to the traditional Fireline.
got it but haven't tried it yet - no ice:( seems pretty supple (2 & 4 lb) but as for visibility, i don't know how it will be.  it is white, but definately opaque.
I've used the 14lb crystal and it works just like the original fireline. In clear water , it looks like mono and it might be a bit softer than the original.
Its still quite visible in the water.
